title: Staroye, Sokolsky District, Vologda Oblast
data: Staroye (Russian: Старое) is a rural locality (a village) in Pelshemskoye Rural Settlement, Sokolsky District, Vologda Oblast, Russia. The population was 2 as of 2002.[2] The distance to Sokol is 40 km, to Markovskoye is 5 km. Popovskoye is the nearest rural locality. This Sokolsky District, Vologda Oblast location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
